articles.title: Shari Redstone ends talks with Skydance Media over deal to control Paramount - Financial Times
articles.description: Decision to halt chaotic sale process has left future of storied Hollywood group hanging in the balance

articles.title: Austrian Airlines plane suffers severe damage in hailstorm - BBC.com
articles.description: Intense hail and turbulence smashed the plane's windscreen and nose as it flew from Spain to Austria.
articles.content:
An Austrian Airlines plane has been seriously damaged, after it was caught up in an intense hailstorm during a flight on Sunday afternoon. 
The aircraft, which was flying from Spain to the Austrian … [+2259 chars]
